function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on learning outcomes of children of immigrants","Impact":"Increased learning losses and gaps between children of immigrants and their peers","Mitigation":"Equal access to digital devices, language exposure, and remediation support","Technologies":"Digital devices and online learning platforms","People":"Children of immigrants, educational institutions","Owner":"Educational institutions, government"},{"Description":"Severe problems for newly arrived migrant and refugee children","Impact":"Significant setback in learning trajectories","Mitigation":"Increased support for newly arrived migrant and refugee children, including language support and direct teacher contact","Technologies":"Language learning apps, online tutoring platforms","People":"Newly arrived migrant and refugee children, educational institutions","Owner":"Educational institutions, government"},{"Description":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","Impact":"Uncertainty about long-term effects and potential disengagement from school","Mitigation":"Long-term monitoring and support for children of immigrants, including mental health and social integration programs","Technologies":"Mental health monitoring apps, online support communities","People":"Children of immigrants, educational institutions, mental health professionals","Owner":"Educational institutions, government, mental health organizations"}]}
